name: attajak.web.app
description: This is a quick start template for Hugo theme [FixIt](https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt). It uses [Hugo modules](https://gohugo.io/hugo-modules/) feature to load the theme.

scripts.preupdate: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule update --remote --merge
scripts.update: hugo mod get -u github.com/hugo-fixit/fixit-bundle@latest && hugo mod tidy && hugo mod graph
scripts.postupdate: git add go.mod go.sum && git commit -m ':arrow_up: Chore(FixIt): Update fixit-bundle version' && git push origin main

author: attajak (https://github.com/attajak)
